alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 6:25PM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Fulton County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow this evening, then changes to sleet and freezing rain from south to north later tonight. Snowfall rates of one inch per hour may occur this evening. The heaviest snow and most icing will likely occur over higher elevations and across the northern part of the advisory area near I-90.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
